SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Player
public class Player extends Object
This class represents a player. It contains all the information about the player, such as the bookshelf, the personal goal, the points, the state and so on.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(PlayerStatusToFile playerStatus, Game game)
      This is the player's constructor. It initializes some variables and initialize the state of the player to PlayerStateWaiting
      Parameters:
      playerStatus - the player's status
      game - the game the player accessed

    • Player

      public Player(String playerID, Game game)
      This is the player's constructor. It initializes some variables and initialize the state of the player to PlayerStateWaiting
      Parameters:
      playerID - string indicating the ID of the player
      game - the game the player accessed

  • Method Details

    • getState

      public PlayerState getState()
      getter for the player's state
      Returns:
      the player's state

    • pickAndInsertInBookshelf

      public void pickAndInsertInBookshelf(ArrayList<Coordinates> tilesSelection, int column, int[] order) throws PlayerIsWaitingException, SelectionNotValidException, SelectionIsEmptyException, ColumnNotValidException, PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException, PickDoesntFitColumnException, TilesSelectionSizeDifferentFromOrderLengthException, WrongConfigurationException, VoidBoardTileException
      This method takes in input an ArrayList of coordinates from the controller indicating the tiles that the player wants to pick and inserts the items in those tiles in the bookshelf in the order specified by the player. It also controls if it is possible to pick the selection according to the game's rules.
      Parameters:
      tilesSelection - the ArrayList of coordinates indicating the tiles to pick
      column - the column where the player wants to place the picked tiles
      order - the order in which the tiles should be placed in the bookshelf
      Throws:
      PlayerIsWaitingException - if the player state is waiting
      SelectionNotValidException - if the selection is not valid (e.g., not all the selected tiles have at least one side free or the selected tiles are not adjacent)
      SelectionIsEmptyException - if the selection is empty
      ColumnNotValidException - if the selected column is not valid
      PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException - if the picked column is out of bounds
      PickDoesntFitColumnException - if the pick doesn't fit in the selected column
      TilesSelectionSizeDifferentFromOrderLengthException - if the size of the tiles selection is different from the length of the order array
      WrongConfigurationException - if the configuration is incorrect
      VoidBoardTileException - if the board tile is void

    • changeState

      public void changeState(PlayerState state)
      This method changes the state of the player. It is called by the controller.
      Parameters:
      state - the next state to set

    • computeRewardGoals

      public void computeRewardGoals() throws WrongConfigurationException
      This method is called at the end of every turn. It updates the points by counting personal goal points, common goal points, and general goal points.
      Throws:
      WrongConfigurationException - if the configuration is incorrect

    • setBookshelf

      public void setBookshelf() throws PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException, PickDoesntFitColumnException
      Set the bookshelf of the player.
      Throws:
      PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException - if the picked column is out of bounds
      PickDoesntFitColumnException - if the pick doesn't fit in the selected column
